text: “Ndipo pamene adalowa monga momwe bambo wawo adawalamulira, sikudawathandize chilichonse kwa Allah kupatula khumbo lomwe lidali mu mtima mwa Ya’qub (ndilomwe) adalikwaniritsa, (Ya’qub adali kufuna Yûsuf ndi m’bale wake akumane mwamseri; ndipo adakumanadi). Ndithu iye (Ya’qub) adali wanzeru chifukwa chakuti tidamphunzitsa. Koma anthu ambiri sadziwa
